title: Keybindings help?
body: Could someone please explain exactly what attack click and attack move click are. i've seen them mentioned, but i dont know what they are.

replies.body: shortest answer i can give is.....attack move (A + left click) or (shift + right click) works the same as just right clicking the ground but if you run into an enemy unit, your character will automatically begin attacking any target that comes in range of you. Its mainly used with adc's to keep yourself from miss-clicking....meaning if you accidentally click the ground in a fight then your character wont automatically run to that spot, they will attack the closest thing to them within their auto attack range. Basically it helps you to stay at your max auto attack range in fights, instead of misclicking on the ground (with your normal right click) and accidentally running into the enemy team. dunno if that gives you a little clarification or not, but i tried lol
This does help a lot. Thank you!
